content: Wheat cultivation requires well-drained soil with pH between 6.0-7.5. Sowing should be done in November-December for optimal yield. Use 100-120 kg seeds per hectare.
Rice requires flooded conditions during most of its growing period. Transplant 21-25 day old seedlings with 2-3 seedlings per hill at 20x15 cm spacing.
Tomato seedlings should be transplanted when they are 4-6 weeks old. Maintain 60x45 cm spacing between plants. Provide support stakes for indeterminate varieties.
